article.title: U.S. Army Awards Multiple C4 Support Contracts
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: TeleCommunication Systems Inc., Annapolis, Md.; By Light Professional IT Services Inc., Arlington, Va.; Cytech Communications LLC, Nokesville, Va.; iGov Technologies Inc., Reston, Va; Sierra Nevada Corp., Sparks, Nev.; and D & S Consultants Inc., Eatontown, N.J.; were awarded a firm-fixed-price, multi-year, multiple-award contract with a maximum value of $48 million for various command, control, communications and computer support services for users located at Fort Bragg, N.C. The Army Contracting Command, Fort Detrick, Md., is the contracting activity.
